about_the_game:
Ethereal: Requiem of Repose is an interactive point-and-click adventure. Follow a moody orphan's journey to unveil forgotten memories and cure her illness. Questions arise as young Valerie Alton becomes fast friends with Susie, a mysterious girl she has seen in her dreams. Accompanied by her undead caregiver Theria, Valerie must keep her secrets and loved ones close. She will come to find that her familial history, as well as her connection with Susie, go deeper than she once thought.



  • Fully animated, voice-acted cutscenes
  • A world full of interactive objects and people
  • Outfit customization
  • Side objectives
  • Impactful decisions

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 "Sierra"
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Physics issues may occur when playing below minimum specifications
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 13 "Ventura"
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Runs natively on Apple Silicon hardware

short_description: Teenage shut-in Valerie becomes unlikely friends with a girl named Susie. As their friendship progresses, she finds that they may have a deeper relationship than she had known. Uncover mysteries with her ghostly caregiver Theria and avoid harrowing haunts in this point-and-click adventure.
